1621170.name: Dungeon Cafe
1621170.description:
Story

One moment you're a world-class chef. The next, you're standing in a void, staring down a demon lord with a smile too wide and too many teeth. You've been summoned — not as a hero, but as a cook.

The Demon Overlord's army grows restless, and monsters don’t march on an empty stomach. Your job? Feed the horde, keep the kitchen from collapsing, and survive long enough to discover why you were chosen. And more importantly… how to get back home.

But the more you cook, the stranger things become. Whispers from the shadows. Ingredients that shouldn't exist. And a growing sense that the café isn’t just serving food — it’s feeding something else entirely.

Gameplay

Run your very own demon-side diner with a mix of cozy management, fast-paced cooking, and combat exploration. Farm ingredients, fight monsters, and automate your café to handle the rush.

Build and expand your café space from a smoky hole in the wall to a multi-room monster magnet. Assign staff to handle cooking, cleaning, and potion mixing while you head out into the world to gather rare ingredients, battle bizarre beasts, and discover strange secrets.

Balance your time between running the kitchen and surviving the chaos outside — because in this world, both are equally deadly.

Features

  • Co-op Chaos: Play solo or team up with friends to run your kitchen. Division of labor is key — and no one wants to wash the dishes.

  • Cook Under Pressure: Brew potions, prepare dishes, and serve hungry monsters before things get out of control. Expect magical fires, impatient demons, and the occasional kitchen explosion.

  • Hunt for Ingredients: Venture out beyond the café to slay strange creatures, gather rare ingredients, and unlock new recipes. The best flavors don’t come easy.

  • Farm, Forage, and Fight: Grow magical crops, collect resources, and defend yourself from the wild things that roam the world beyond the café.

  • Build & Customize Your Café: Upgrade your kitchen equipment, decorate your space, and unlock new tools to better manage the chaos.

  • Manage & Automate: Hire and assign monster staff to streamline cooking, cleaning, and crafting tasks so your café runs like a well-oiled (or slime-covered) machine.

  • Uncover the Mystery: Discover the truth behind your summoning and the sinister forces behind the Demon Overlord’s appetite.
1621170.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
